metadata.inclusion: Press “L+R” buttons simultaneously until LED light up to add the device into ZRC-90 Z-Wave network
metadata.exclusion: Click once on the “R” button to remove the device from ZRC-90 Z-Wave network
metadata.reset:
Press and keep holding “R” button not less than 10 seconds.
Release “R” button then triple click on “R” button within 2 seconds
